code: import React from"react";import"../styles/styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(_ref){let{numberOfItems,totalCartPrice,cart,setCart,removeItem}=_ref;/*if cart has zero number of items: */if(numberOfItems===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"the-cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"empty-cart",children:"The cart is empty!"})})});}else{/*Removing items based on unique item index */return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"the-cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Shopping Cart (",numberOfItems," items)"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["Total: $",totalCartPrice.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cart-items",children:Array.isArray(cart)&&cart.length>0&&cart.map((cartItem,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cart-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{id:"cart-image",src:cartItem.rollImage,alt:cartItem.rollAltText}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{id:"cart-roll-type",children:cartItem.rollType}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{id:"cart-glaze",children:["Glazing: ",cartItem.rollGlaze]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{id:"cart-pack",children:["Pack Size: ",cartItem.rollPack]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{id:"cart-pricing",children:["$ ",cartItem.rollPrice.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>removeItem(cartItem.rollIndex),children:"Remove"})]},index))})]});}}export default Cart;
